name: Ouroboros (itch) (DCsquared)
description: Enjoyed snake and snake clones? Have you seen one in 3D? No. Well Ouroboros is just that, a 3D snake game. Become the last snake standing as you shoot, dash, and ram your opponents to sweet sweet victory.  This is a student capstone game prototype made in Unreal Engine 4 that I worked on with 2 other classmates.  I handled all of the UI, the scene transitions,  and the power up system. Check out the game website here https://dmcannon27.wixsite.com/ouroboros!
